import React, { useState } from 'react' import "../App.css" import Footer from './Footer' import Grid from './Grid' import Middle from './Middle' function Intro() { const [email,setEmail]=useState() const handleClick=(email)=>{ const pattern = /[a-zA-Z0-9]+[\.]?([a-zA-Z0-9]+)?[\@][a-z]{3,9}[\.][a-z]{2,5}/g; const result = pattern.test(email); if(result===true){ document.getElementById("alert").style.display="none" } } const handleChange=(e)=>{ let emailInput=e.target.value setEmail(emailInput) } return ( <>

) } export default Intro
